description: Detects successful logon with logon type 9 (NewCredentials) which matches the Overpass the Hash behavior of e.g Mimikatz's sekurlsa::pth module. Author: Roberto Rodriguez (source), Dominik Schaudel (rule). License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Successful Overpass the Hash Attempt
query: (winlog.channel:"Security" AND winlog.event_id:"4624" AND winlog.event_data.LogonType:"9" AND winlog.event_data.LogonProcessName:"seclogo" AND winlog.event_data.AuthenticationPackageName:"Negotiate")
